tutorials.description: Getting Started with OCI Email Delivery with Postfix

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.description: Setting up and configuring a domain for OCI Email Delivery

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create an Approved Sender
tutorials.description: Setting up an approved sender for OCI Email Delivery

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Install and Configure Postfix
tutorials.description: Installing and configuring Postfix to test Email Delivery

tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
